definition.script: node { stage 'AOS Build Git Web' echo '=== AOS_Build_Git Web ===' echo '=== This build reqires the devops, aos_postgres and aos_tomcat containers ===' build job: 'AOS_Build_DemoApp-master_Git' stage 'AOS Deploy Docker Images Web' echo '=== AOS_Deploy_Docker_Images_Web ===' build job: 'AOS_Deploy_Docker_Images_Web' stage 'AOS Run Docker Container Web' echo '=== AOS_Run_Docker_Container_Web ===' build job: 'AOS_Run_Docker_Container_Web' stage 'AOS Start Docker Image Web' echo '=== AOS_Start_Docker_Image_Web ===' build job: 'AOS_Start_Docker_Image_Web' stage 'AOS Run Regressions Test Web' echo '=== AOS Run Regressions Test Web ===' build 'AOS_Run_Regression_Test_Web' echo '=== Build Completed ===' }
